name: PROXY (itch) (EricsonSoftworks)
description:
A very short game, made for the Epic Mega Jam 2022.

I had to shorten the Game substantially, I made it into of a proof of concept project due to the Time limit.All Assets except ;

-Chair Model

-Car Model,

ambient sound (Above ground)

and

Megascans Object and Textures.

Were made for the projects in the 7-day time period.

W, A, S, D to move,

Mouse to Look,

E and Q to interact,

Esc to Pause

had upload problems, here are additional Download link; RAR File, 1.65GB
